title: Stylish grey rattan set for £399
content:
At last, warmer summer days are upon us, which probably means you’ll be spending a lot more time relaxing in your garden. And with the Lakewood Grey Corner Rattan Set, you can kick back in style. This fabulous set includes a 5-seater corner rattan sofa, coffee table and even cushions covers and pads, all in a modern grey finish. Did we mention it’s even made from all-weather garden fabric to withstand the unpredictable British weather? Happy days! With this exclusive deal, you can get this beautiful collection for just £399, instead of the usual £479, plus free delivery. Just enter the code WOW-LAKEWOOD-2021 at the checkout to receive your discount.

Claim your offer now!

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

A classic choice for outdoor living, the Lakewood Grey Corner Rattan Set is sure to look the part in any outdoor space. Here are some of the other features you’re sure to love:

  • Made from all-weather garden fabric, including water-resistant cushions (please read care label and bring cushions indoors in harsh weather conditions)
  • Tempered glass table-top to ensure durability and easier cleaning
  • One-year warranty as standard

Claim your offer now!

Click on the image below for exclusive summer deals…

Offer ends 20/09/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

author: Steve Newell
